Cannot complete install on Ubuntu Mate 20.04LTS. It throws up X Window system error, viz:
The program 'CubicSDR' received an X Window System error.
This probably reflects a bug in the program.
The error was 'BadValue (integer parameter out of range for operation)'.
 (Details: serial 356 error_code 2 request_code 152 minor_code 3)
 (Note to programmers: normally, X errors are reported asynchronously;
  that is, you will receive the error a while after causing it.
So it does need attention by someone having a higher paygrade than me.
